title: Lime and coconut syllabub
description: Katy Beskow’s simple syllabub is rich and creamy with a hint of lime. Serve chilled in glasses for the perfect minimalist dessert.
ingredients: 400ml can full-fat coconut milk, chilled until fully cold
Finely grated zest 1 lime,juice ½ lime
1 tsp toasted coconut chips/flakes (from Ocado and health food stores)

method.Step 1: Open the can of chilled coconut milk and scoop out the solid cream from the top, discarding the coconut water (or reserve it for another recipe). Spoon the cream into a mixing bowl and add the yogurt. Use an electric whisk to whip the coconut cream, yogurt and maple syrup together for 5 minutes or until gentle peaks form when the whisk is removed.

method.Step 2: Stir most of the lime zest into the creamy coconut mixture, then squeeze in the lime juice.

method.Step 3: Spoon into dessert dishes or glasses. Top with a few toasted coconut chips or flakes and the reserved lime zest.
